Her goal is to help her husband build a house for the family.

loans.use: to buy  20 sets of pagnes fabric, 25 liters of sodabi liquor and two boxes of assorted buttons.

loans.name: Microempresarios Emprendedores Group

texts.es: Elery de 37 años es separado con 02 hijos en etapa escolar. Con mucho esfuerzo y trabajo  a logrado cumplir con algunos de sus metas como mejorar la calidad de vida de sus hijos y contar con un negocio propio, la cual actualmente se dedica a la venta de frituras como salchipapas, hamburguesas, chorizos, etc. en un carrito de comidas rápidas. Aparte nos manifiesta que brinda servicio de albañil, obteniendo un ingreso mas para su hogar. El crédito que recibió lo destinara  para la compra de insumos como pollos, chorizos, papas, cubiertos, etc. Su meta a futuro es de comprarse otros carritos de comida rápida donde pueda distribuirla en lugares céntricos. Elery es integrante de la Alcancía Comunal “Microempresarios Emprendedores” la cual está conformada por 08 socios responsables y trabajadores siendo la gran mayoría vecinos de la zona. Elery está ubicado en la parte posterior del lado derecho viste polo color verde.
texts.en:
Elery, age 37, is separated from his spouse and has two children who are of school age. Through great effort and hard work, he was able to accomplish some of his goals such as improving his children’s quality of life and establishing his own business. He currently sells food such as “salchipapas” (sausages and potatoes), hamburgers, chorizo sausages, and other items from a fast food cart.

The loan he is receiving will be used to buy supplies such as chicken, chorizo sausage, potatoes, cutlery, and other items. His goal for the future is to buy other fast food carts so that he can sell in several central locations.

Elery is a member of the Communal Bank “Microempresarios Emprendedores” (Enterprising Micro-Entrepreneurs), which consists of eight responsible and hardworking members. Most of them are neighbors from the same area. Elery is standing at the back on the right-hand side, wearing a green shirt.

loans.use: to buy chicken, chorizo sausage, potatoes, cutlery, and other supplies.

loans.name: Mamadou

texts.fr:
Mr Mamadou âgé de 28 ans célibataire habite  à environ 1 km de la caisse, de profession Boucher à séras il achète de la viande et des têtes de bovins  pour les revendre, il pratique ce métier depuis  10 ans, il commence sa journée à 8 h pour le finir à 20 h.
Mr Mamadou demande ce crédit pour fructifier son commerce. Il veut un jour avoir un fond de roulement pour satisfaire sa clientèle.
texts.en: Mamadou is 28 years and single; he lives around 1 km from his branch and is a butcher by trade. He buys beef and cows' heads to sell on and has been exercising this profession for the past ten years. He begins his day at 8 o'clock in the morning and finishes at 20h. Mamadou is requesting this loan to boost his business. He would one day like to have sufficient working capital to satisfy customer demand.

loans.use: to buy beef and cows' heads to sell on and boost his business.

loans.name: Akuavi Flora's Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est constitué de deux personnes en caution solidaire. Akuavi Flora, la responsable, est âgée de 38 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 03 enfants tous scolarisés. Akuavi Flora coiffe et vend des pagnes depuis quelques années et s'approvisionne dans l'un des marchés du Bénin. En vue de répondre à la demande de sa clientèle et de satisfaire les besoins de ses enfants, Akuavi Flora a sollicité et obtenu un micro crédit à Finadev. Akuavi Flora se retrouve à gauche de la photo.
texts.en: This group is made up of two people and they have joint liability. Akuavi Flora, who is in charge, is 38 years old, married and mother to three children, who are all at school. Akuavi Flora has been a hairdresser and has also selling "pagnes" (pieces of colourful fabric) for the past few years, and she gets her supplies in a Benin market. With a view to responding to customer demand and satisfying her children's needs, she has requested and been granted a micro-loan from Finadev. Akuavi Flora is on the left of the photo.

loans.use: to buy a carton of hair extensions and 20 "pagnes" of all varieties.

loans.name: Josecito De Cumbe  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Josecito de Cumbe está formado por 10 socias, quienes viven por sectores aledaños de la parroquia de Cumbe de Cuenca, esta parroquia tiene un clima frió, se encuentra rodeado por montañas las mismas que le brindan hermosos paisajes para disfrutar de la naturaleza. Su gente es amable, gentil y de un corazón muy cálido, laboran en diferentes actividades como la agricultura, el comercio y cría de animales, muchos salen diariamente en la ciudad ejerciendo diferentes actividades de trabajo. Nuestras socias son muy trabajadoras y aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos. 

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Zoila María, tiene 52 años de edad, es madre soltera y ha concebido 4 hijos, dos de sus hijos son casados y viven independientes, uno de sus hijos trabaja y ayuda económicamente y su ultimo hijo estudia en un colegio del sector, Ella vive en casa de uno de sus hijos.
 
Doña Zoila María se dedica a la agricultura, labra sus propios terrenos y sus cosechas son para el consumo de su hogar y para la venta, cría y vende gallinas, cuyes, pollos y cerdos. También trabaja ordeñando ganado desde una muy corta edad, trabaja todos los días.
 
Es socia del banco comunal hace 15 años y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir comprando pollos y  alimento para sus animales.
 
Su meta es criar más animales.
texts.en:
The Josecito de Cumbe Communal Bank is made up of 10 members who live in the parish of Cumbe de Cuenca.  The parish has a cold climate, and is surrounded by mountains that provide beautiful scenery where people can enjoy nature.  The residents are kind, gentle, and warm-hearted, and make a living from economic activities that include farming, commerce, and raising animals.  Many residents commute to the city every day for work in various sectors.  The members of the Josecito de Cumbe communal bank are very hardworking and maintain their local culture and traditions.

One of the group’s members is Zoila María.  She is 52 years old and is a single mother who has 4 children.  Two of her children are married and no longer live with her.  One of her children works and helps her financially, while the youngest goes to school in the area.  Zoila María lives in the house of one of her children.  

Zoila María makes a living farming.  She farms her own land, and grows her crops for home consumption and sale.  She also raises and sells chickens, guinea pigs, and pigs.  In addition, Zoila María has worked milking cows since she was a young age.  She works every day.       

She has been a member of her communal bank for 15 years, and will use her new loan to purchase chickens and animal feed.

Zoila María’s goal is to raise more animals.

loans.use: to purchase chickens and animal feed.

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es:
Fernando tiene 20 años, es un hombre muy amable y emprendedor. Es soltero y no tiene hijos. Vive en casa de sus padres, con sus tres hermanos, a quienes apoya y quiere mucho.
Él es electricista, oficio que aprendió en un centro de adiestramiento industrial. Le gustó y decidió iniciar su negocio hace un año, realiza un buen trabajo por lo que lo solicitan de empresas privadas. Trabaja en compañía de un amigo, del mismo oficio, quien le presta los equipos eléctricos necesarios para realizar esta actividad. Ahora ya tiene muchos clientes y bastante demanda, lo que le enorgulleces. Lo bueno es que le ha permitido tener ingresos económicos sustanciales para pagar los gastos de su hogar y darles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hermanos; lo que no le gusta es el riesgo que implica esta actividad, ya tiene que estar hasta muy tarde en las noches para poder terminar y entregar los pedidos en la fecha solicitada. Este tipo de rutina le ha provocado algunos malestares de salud, pero eso no lo desanima y desea poder ampliar su negocio instalando un taller de soldaduras.

Este es su primer préstamo con la institución MFP, por tanto se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además, comenta estar a gusto con el banco comunal donde acaba de ingresar, pues sus miembros son personas responsables.
Con el préstamo solicitado, de 1000 nuevos soles, invertirá como parte de pago por la compra de una máquina de soldar valorizada en 3000 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Fernando is 20 years old, single, and doesn't have any children.  He is a very kind and entrepreneurial man.  He lives in his parents' house together with his three siblings who he supports and loves dearly.

Fernando is an electrician.  He learned this trade in an industrial training center.  He enjoyed it and decided to set up his own business one year ago.  He does good work and so private companies ask for him.  He works together with a friend who is in the same trade.  He lends him the electrical equipment he needs to do his work.  Now Fernando has a lot of customers and quite a lot of demand which makes him proud.  This is good as it has allowed him to make substantial income with which to cover his household expenses and provide his siblings with a better quality of life.  What he doesn't like are the risks that he faces in this business as he has to stay until very late at night in order to be able to finish and deliver his jobs on time.  This type of routine has caused him some health problems but he is not discouraged and would like to be able to expand his business, setting up a welding workshop.

This is Fernando's first loan from MFP and he pledges to make his repayments on time.  He feels happy with the community bank that he has just joined because the members are responsible people.  Fernando will put this loan for 1,000 soles towards buying a welding machine which costs 3,000 soles.

loans.use: to buy a welding machine (putting his loan money together with some money he already has)

loans.name: Rocio

texts.es:
Roció tiene 41 años, es una mujer alegre y con deseos de superación. Es soltera y no tiene hijos.  Vive en compañía de su hermana y su cuñado.
Su actividad es la compra y venta de carne de res en diversas presentaciones como filetes, molido y otros. Compra la carne en el camal municipal y de los ganaderos, la vende en un puesto en el mercado de su localidad, con la ayuda de una muchacha para la atención al público. Se inició hace más de 25 años con un capital propio, comprando en pequeñas cantidades que luego fue aumentando según la demanda. Considera a su negocio bastante rentable, por las ganancias que le deja, logrando tener una buena acogida y siendo muy conocida en el mercado. 

Este es su quinto préstamo con la institución MFP, con lo que cuenta para poder concretar sus planes. Promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, además de sentirse muy bien con su banco comunal, pues son personas sociables y solidarias.
Con el monto solicitado, de 4000 nuevos soles, invertirá en la compra de un congelador, valorizado en 1200 nuevos soles. También adquirirá tres vacas, para la venta de la carne, cada una valorizada en 900 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Rocío is 41 years old. She is a cheerful woman, who is eager to better herself.  She is single and doesn't have any children. She lives with her sister and brother-in-law.

Her business is buying and selling different cuts of beef, such as steaks, ground beef, and others. She purchases the meat from the local slaughterhouse and from cattle ranchers, and sells it at a market stall in her town, with the assistance of another girl who helps at the counter. She started out over 25 years ago with her own capital, purchasing small quantities which increased gradually in response to demand. She considers her business to be quite profitable because of the income it brings in. It has been well received and has become very well known in the market.

This is her fifth loan with MFP, and she counts on the institution to realize her plans. She promises to pay her installments, and she feels very good about her communal bank, because they are a sociable and supportive group of people.

She will use the amount requested, 4000 nuevos soles, to invest in the purchase of a freezer, which is valued at 1200 nuevos soles. She will also purchase three cows, in order to sell their meat, which are valued at 900 nuevos soles each.

loans.use: to purchase a freezer and three cows, in order to sell their meat.

loans.name: Esfuerzo Es Exito Group

texts.es: La Alcancía Comunal “Esfuerzo Es Éxito” es un grupo nuevo que está conformada por 08 socios entusiastas de comenzar a trabajar con el Programa- Prosperidad, siendo Miriam una de las integrantes.  Miriam tiene 29 años de edad es separada con 01 hijo a su cargo. Actualmente se dedica a la venta de ropa y zapatos la cual lo realiza a pedidos. También cuenta con 01 mototaxi la cual brinda servicio de transporte, obteniendo un ingreso extra para su hogar. Gracias a su trabajo Miriam ha podido apoyar a su hijo en su educación. Su mayor deseo es de construir su vivienda. Con el crédito que solicito comprara ropa por temporada como chompas, chalinas, buzos, etc. La nueva Alcancía Comunal “Esfuerzo Es Éxito” agradecen el crédito brindado ya que hacen posible su progreso. Miriam está ubicada en la parte posterior, es la segunda del lado derecho viste una chompa color morada con granjas negras y plomas.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank “Esfuerzo Es Éxito” (Effort Is Success) is a new group that consists of eight enthusiastic members who are starting their work with the “Prosperidad” (Prosperity) Program.

One of the members is Miriam. She is 29 years old, separated from her spouse, and has one dependent child. Miriam currently sells clothing and shoes upon request. She also owns a motorcycle taxi that is used for providing transportation services and generating extra household income. Thanks to her work, Miriam is able to provide for her child’s education. Her greatest wish is to build a home. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy seasonal clothing such as sweaters, scarves, and sweatshirts.

The new Communal Bank “Esfuerzo Es Éxito” is grateful for the loan that has been granted since it is now possible for them to make progress. Miriam is standing at the back, second from the right. She is wearing a purple sweater with black and gray stripes.

loans.use: to buy sweaters, scarves, and sweatshirts.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia tiene 20 años, es una joven muy trabajadora y dinámica con ganas de superación. Es soltera, no tiene hijos y vive en la casa de sus padres con sus tres hermanos.
Su actividad es la venta de carne de res en un puesto instalado en el mercado de su localidad. Empezó hace 3 años con un capital propio y viendo la necesidad de contar con un ingreso propio. Le gusta porque le permite interactuar con muchas personas, además los ingresos económicos que le genera pueden solventar los gastos de su hogar y el pago de sus estudios universitarios. Lo que no le gusta es que algunos de sus clientes le solicitan crédito, pero ella se niega, pues ya tuvo malas experiencias con este tipo de compra. Tienen planes de implementar su negocio y seguir creciendo.

Este es el cuarto préstamo que tiene con la institución MFP y se siente contenta de contar con el apoyo financiero para avanzar con su negocio, por eso asegura será puntual en el pago de sus cuotas. Además se siente muy cómodo con su grupo, ya que los considera buenas personas y muy solidarios.
Con el monto solicitado, de 2500 nuevos soles, invertirá en el arreglo de la infraestructura de su puesto, cambiando de mesa y comprando algunas sierras de corte de carne, además de más carne de res para la venta.
texts.en:
Julia, 20, is a dynamic young woman who works hard to get ahead.  She is single and lives with her parents and three brothers and sisters.
She operates a meat sales business at a local market.  She started the business--using her own savings--3 years ago because she needed an income of her own.  She likes owning her own business because she can pay her university fees and still have enough left to contribute to her family expenses.  Working in the market is a bonus because she likes being with other people.  She doesn't like that some of her customers want to buy on credit and, in fact, she no longer extends credit because of some bad experiences in the past.  For the future, she wants to expand the business.
Julia says that this is her fourth MFP loan and she is grateful for the support because past loans helped her to establish the business.  She knows that she has to repay the loan in the agreed-upon time to secure future loans.  She adds that the members of her community bank are responsible and supportive.
Julia will use this 2500 new soles loan to buy supplies she needs for the business and meat that she will resell.

loans.use: to supply her meat business.

loans.name: Walter

texts.en:
Walter has been engaged in a livestock business. He is currently raising two animals for fattening. Walter is 39 years of age and married. The couple were blessed with five children who go to school. Their main goal is to let their children finish their studies so that they can find better opportunities someday.

Walter would like to increase his profit because his children's education fees are increasing. Some of his income goes immediately to their household expenses, farming, and the daily allowances of his children. So, he is encouraged to borrow additional working capital in order for him to improve their way of living and educate his five children. He has asked for a loan of 20,000 Philippine pesos, which he will use to buy three piglets and sacks of livestock feed. This will enable him to obtain more income. He believes that the business will grow and will help him in the attainment of his dreams in life.

loans.use: to buy three piglets and hog feed for his livestock business

loans.name: Guttierez

texts.en:
Guttierez has been running his hog-raising business for five years. He has strong determination to succeed. He enjoys feeding his hogs and cleaning their pig pen. He has been doing this because he wants to succeed.

Guttierez raised two sows and piglets. He has been doing this type of business for more than five years. Guttierez is married and has been blessed with three children. All his children go to school, so his daily expenses are increasing due to their allowances, tuition fees, and other school expenses. Aside from the livestock business, he is also involved in raising corn crops and running a transportation business as his additional sources of income. 

Guttierez would like to take out a loan of 25,000 Philippine pesos, which he will use to buy three piglets and livestock feed for his raised hogs. He hopes that he will be able to supply all the needs of his raised hogs in order to make them healthy upon reaching their optimum growth. He would be grateful if his requested loan amount were approved because this would mean he could give his children good-quality education and a better way of living.

loans.use: to buy three piglets and livestock feed for his hogs

loans.name: Anthony

texts.es:
Anthony tiene 29 años, es un hombre emprendedor y muy trabajador. Está separado de la madre de su hijo. Ahora él vive con sus padres, tres hermanos, dos cuñados y su sobrino.
Su actividad es la compra y venta de motos y motocarros usados, los repara y los convierte en motos de carrera, luego los vende a precios más altos. Para esto cuenta con un local alquilado donde realiza todo este trabajo con la ayuda de un primo que es mecánico de motos. Se inició en este negocio hace más de un año y lo considera rentable por las buenas ganancias que le deja y el poco tiempo que le toma realizarlo. Antes de empezar con esta actividad tenía apuros económicos, ya que el sueldo que recibe por trabajar medio tiempo en una empresa, no le alcanzaba para los gastos de su hijo. Sus planes a futuro son de tener una tienda para la venta de motos de diferentes modelos y marcas.

Este es su primer préstamo con la institución MFP y está muy contento de saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, así se siente seguro de mantenerse con su negocio. Por tanto, se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de sus cuotas.
Con el monto solicitado, de 3000 nuevos soles, invertirá en la compra de una moto usada valorizada en 1500 nuevos soles, más los repuestos y accesorios para su transformación.
texts.en:
Anthony, 29, is a hard-working and enterprising man.  He is separated from the mother of his son and now lives with his parents, his brothers and sisters and their families.  
Anthony operates a business buying and selling motorcycles.  He buys used motorcycles, repairs them and refits them for racing so he can sell them at a much higher price.  He rents a space where he carries out the work.  His cousin, a mechanic, helps him with the repairs.  Anthony started the business more than a year ago and says that he is encouraged with his progress because he's already making a little money.  He didn't earn much from the part-time job that he had before and his pay wasn't enough to provide for his son.  For the future, he wants to open a store where he can sell motorcycles of different makes and models.  
Anthony says that this is his first MFP loan.  He is glad to have found this means of financing his business and is committed to repaying the loan in the agreed-upon time.  
Anthony is applying for a 3000 new soles loan.  He will use 1500 new soles to buy a used motorcycle and the rest for parts and accessories to refit it.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle, parts and accessories for his motorcycle refitting business.

loans.name: Washington Olmedo

texts.es: En la Isla Trinitaria sur de Guayaquil Washington tiene un local donde vende comidas, está ubicado en su domicilio y lo atiende con su esposa Flora quien se encarga de la preparación de la comida. Su historia empezó hace 32 años, cuando abrió el local por insistencia de su esposa e hijas quienes le animaron a invertir. Esta muy satisfecho por el crecimiento que a tenido ya que actualmente cuenta con un local pequeño, mesas y utensilios para la venta. Washington está seguro que el éxito en el mismo es por su esposa quien tiene buena sazón y según los comensales cocina rico. El comedor se abre a partir de las 10 de la mañana hasta las 3 de la tarde brindando solo el servicio de almuerzo. Adicional a esto, Washington realiza carreras como chofer de taxis para aumentar sus ingresos. A sus 58 años se siente muy satisfecho de poder seguir manteniendo a su familia y lo seguirá asiendo por muchos años más. Con el crédito que solicita va a mejorar la vivienda comprando arena, cemento y piedra, ya que está parcialmente construida, con esto espera mejorar la imagen de su local para atraer mas cliente.
texts.en:
In Isla Trinitaria, which is south of Guayaquil, Washington has a shop where he sells food. His business is located in his home and he manages the place with his wife Flora, who is in charge of preparing the food. His story begins at the age of 32, which is when he opened this business at the insistence of his wife and daughter, who were excited about investing in this venture. Washington is very satisfied that his business has grown to the point that he now has a small shop with tables and utensils so that he can generate sales. He is confident of his success because his guests say that his wife’s cooking is very flavorful. The eatery is open from 10am to 3pm since it only serves lunches. In addition to his business, Washington also works as a taxi driver to earn more income.

At the age of 58, he is pleased that he is able to continue supporting his family and is confident that he will able to do so for many more years to come. He is requesting a home improvement loan so that he can buy sand, cement, and stones to help with partial construction. Washington hopes to improve the appearance of his shop so that he can attract more customers.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, and stones.

loans.name: Duo El Rosario De Vista Hermosa Group

texts.es:
DUO EL ROSARIO DE VISTA HERMOSA
Doña Ofelia se dedica a la venta de Ropa (blusas de tela para damas en diferentes tallas y colores.) Sus puntos de ventas son los diferentes mercados de diferentes pueblos. Entre semana vende en su aldea Vista Hermosa, y los fines de semana salen a vender al lado de su esposo a los mercados. Los pedidos de blusas han crecido ya que los clientes se lo hacen por docenas y ya no por unidad. El capital que tienen no les alcanza por tal motivo se ven en la necesidad de solicitar un nuevo crédito, para poder ella comprar las docenas de blusas y venderlas en los diferentes lugares.  Tiene dos hijos, y el sueño para ella es que sean unas personas de bien y que sean profesionales, ya que ella no sabe leer ni escribir, y les quiere dar lo mejor a sus hijos para que tengan mejores oportunidades en el mañana como ella nunca los tuvo.
texts.en:
Ofelia works selling clothing (cloth blouses for women, in different sizes and colors). She sells her items in several markets in several towns. On weekdays she works in her own village, Vista Hermosa, and on weekends she goes out to the markets with her husband to make her sales. Orders for blouses have increased, since customers are ordering them by the dozen, instead of by the unit. The capital they have isn't enough, so that is why they find themselves in need of requesting a new loan, so that she can purchase the dozens of blouses and sell them at the different locations. 
She has two children, and her dream is for them to become decent people and work as professionals. She can't read or write, and wants to provide the best for her children, so that they can have better opportunities in the future, which she never did.

loans.use: to purchase clothing (blouses) for sale.

loans.name: Camino Al Exito Group

texts.es: La Alcancía Comunal “Camino Al Exito” es un grupo conformado por 08 socios, que por diferentes circunstancias tuvieron que buscar la manera de generar sus propios ingresos a través de sus negocios con el propósito de no faltar la economía en sus hogares. La señora Celia tiene 22 años conviviente con 02 hijos dependientes. Celia comenzó trabajando de ayudante en un restaurante, lo que pudo ahorrar para iniciar su propio negocio, actualmente se dedica a la venta de mazamorras, papa rellena, pan con pollo, etc. donde cada día los ofrece en una losa deportiva de su localidad. Celia se siente orgullosa pues con su trabajo y esfuerzo a podido apoyar a su pareja para la compra de su terreno. Celia piensa seguir invirtiendo en su negocio pues comprara insumos como papa, aceite, limón, azúcar, etc. Lo que piensa hacer más adelante es poner una fuente de soda, donde a futuro le brindara mejores  ingresos. Celia está ubicada en la parte de adelante es la primera del lado derecho y la podemos apreciar con sus 02 menores hijos.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Camino Al Exito" Is a group made up of 8 members that for different circumstances had to look for a way to generate their own incomes through their businesses, with the intention to not fall behind in their home finances. 

Celia has lived with her partner for 22 years and they have 2 dependent children.  Celia started working as an assistant in a restaurant, through which she was able to save to start her own business.  Now she sells mazamorras (pudding made with corn starch, sugar and honey), stuffed potatoes, bread with chicken, etc. and each day she sells them in a sports' court in her region.  Celia feels proud that with her work and effort she has been able to support her partner in buying his land.  

Celia plans to continue investing in her business, so she will buy supplies like potatoes, oil, lemon, sugar, etc.  Looking forward, she considers starting a soda fountain, which will bring her better earnings in the future.  Celia is located in the front, she is the first on the right and we can see her with her two young children.

loans.use: to buy supplies

loans.name: Unidas Para Alcanzar El Exito Group

texts.es:
Ana es la dueña de la “ANTICUCHERIA NAOMI”  le puso el nombre por su hija, fue hace 01 año que decidió empezar este negocio con algo de dinero pudo comprar lo necesario para iniciarlo, le sirvió mucho los estudios de chef que realizo tiempo atrás, pero la mejor enseñanza que recibió fue de su madre quien la ayudo a mejorar en la preparación de los anticuchos que vende,  la calle donde está ubicada es muy transitada esto la favorece para que sus ventas sean buenas, gracias a eso puede ayudar a su esposo que es moto taxista, juntos salen adelante están ahorrando para comprarse una casa propia, Ana es la secretaria de la alcancía “UNIDAS PARA ALCANZAR EL ÉXITO”  y el préstamo obtenido atravez de la alcancía le servirá para compra de sus insumos esto es condimentos y aceite, con esto espera seguir trabajando para poder lograr en el futuro un lugar estable en algún local para poner su restaurante.

* Ana aparece en la foto cargando una bebe con chompa rosada.
texts.en:
Ana owns the ANTICUCHERIA NAOMI restaurant.  (Anticuchos are a traditional Peruvian meat-based dish.)  She started the business a year ago and named it for her daughter.  She had already trained as a chef and used some money that she had to start the business.  She adds that much of what she needed to know to prepare anticuchos, she learned from her mother.  Ana operates the business on a busy street and says that she is happy with the revenue that's coming in from the business.  Thanks to the business, she has been able to help her husband--a taxi driver--with the family's expenses and save for a house.  Ana is the secretary of the UNIDAS PARA ALCANZAR EL EXITO community bank.  She will use the loan to buy the supplies she needs--condiments and cooking oil--to run the business.  The investment will allow her to continue working and meet her goal of moving the restaurant to a permanent space.

*Ana is the woman in the photo with the baby in the pink sweater.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her restaurant business.

loans.name: Alexander

texts.en:
Alexander, who lives with his spouse and three children within the local community of Ngileb Alfonso Lista, is an industrious and responsible person who has been operating a hog-raising business for five years. Agriculture is the family's primary source of income; Alexander is currently raising three pigs for fattening and also growing corn. He does this to enable his children to achieve a high level of education because it's the only legacy he can provide to them.

Thankful that his wife is supportive in managing their agricultural business, Alexander aims for improved financial stability in order to lift his family out of poverty. To fulfill his dreams, he is requesting a loan of PHP 20,000 to buy hog feed, vitamins and three piglets. He believes that this amount will help him to succeed someday.

loans.use: to buy hog feed, vitamins and three piglets to raise.

loans.name: Gregorio

texts.en:
Forty-three years old, married and the father of two children, Gregorio raises hogs. Additional sources of income for his family are his corn farming business and his wife's job.

Gregorio is requesting a loan of PHP 25,000 to buy additional piglets and hog feed, and hopes to have continuous access to the financial services of KIVA through ASKI to be able to maintain his hog-raising business. This amount would really be of great help in improving their financial stability and living conditions.

loans.use: to buy five piglets.

loans.name: Juan Miguel

texts.es: Juan es maestro albañil con una experiencia de 11 años. Tiene 29 años vive en Portoviejo  con su familia pero sus trabajos siempre los realiza fuera de la ciudad. Juan aprendió esta actividad a los 18 años ayudando a un tío quien le enseño el oficio. De su trabajo indica que tiene buenas ganancias cuando hay obras aunque si es agotador porque no cuentan con maquinaria para ciertos procesos con lo que aumenta el esfuerzo físico. Actualmente la obra en la que trabaja es en Quevedo donde están construyendo una casa con departamentos, viaja los lunes y regresa los sábados en la tarde para pasar con la familia. Uno de sus hermanos se dedica al mismo trabajo y es con él con quien viaja, prefiere hacerlo así porque gana más dinero ya que pocos quieren trabajar fuera de la ciudad. Se esposa Letty realiza quehaceres domésticos y cuida de sus hijos. El préstamo que solicita Juan es para construir de cemento su casa de caña la cual construyo hace 5 años, desea darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y sobre todo a su hija menor a quien quiere ver crecer en un hogar estable y seguro.
texts.en:
Juan is a master bricklayer with 11 years of experience. He and his family have lived in Portoviejo for 29 years, but his jobs always take him outside of the city. Juan learned this trade at the age of 18 from an uncle who was willing to teach him. He says that his work generates good income whenever there are projects that lack machinery, so certain steps can be exhausting due to the increased amount of physical effort.

Juan is currently working on a project in Quevedo that involves building a house with apartments. He travels on Monday and returns home on Saturday afternoon so that he can spend time with his family. One of his brothers is also in the same line of work, so they travel together. He prefers this arrangement because he can earn more money since few people want to work outside of the city. His wife Letty handles the household chores and looking after their children.

The loan Juan is requesting will be used to build a cement house. His current home is made of reeds and was built five years ago. He wants to provide a better quality of life for his family, especially his young daughter who wants to grow up in a stable and secure home.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and stones.

loans.name: Nelly

texts.es:
Nelly tiene 41 años, es una mujer alegre, luchadora y muy emprendedora. Su pareja es Cayo, quien es el padre de sus dos hijos: Erick y Brayan de 18 y 17 años respectivamente. Viven juntos en su propia casa, la que compraron con mucho esfuerzo.

Su negocio es la venta de madera aserrada en listones, tablillas, parqués y otros, para paredes y pisos. La madera la compra de los aserraderos y la vende desde su casa, donde tiene un espacio acondicionado para ello. Inició hace más de un año con un capital propio, vendiendo  en pequeñas cantidades, luego fue aumentando sus ventas según la demanda. Considera a su negocio bastante rentable, por las ganancias que le deja. Antes de empezar tenía dificultades económicas, ya que los gastos aumentaron con la llegada de sus hijos, además de la necesidad de contar con una ocupación y un ingreso económico para apoyar a su pareja con los gastos del hogar. Viendo los buenos resultados que tiene desea continuar e invertir en ampliar su casa para dar en alquiler algunas habitaciones.

Este es su préstamo número 5 con la institución MFP, por lo que se siente contenta de contar con un capital de trabajo para entregar los pedidos que tiene pendiente. Además, se siente a gusto con su banco comunal porque son personas unidas y colaboradoras.
Con el monto solicitado, de 4000 nuevos soles, invertirá en la compra de madera en listones, tablillas y otros, en mayor volumen, buscando los precios más bajos.
texts.en:
Nelly, 41, is a happy woman, hard-working and enterprising.  Her partner, Cayo, is the father of her two children, Erick and Brayan, 18- and 17-years old, respectively.  The live in a house that they worked very hard to buy.

Nelly buys and sells lumber.  She buys the lumber--some in strips, other in sheets--from a supplier and sells it piece by piece from a yard behind her house.  She started the business more than a year ago with some money that she had.  She only sold a few pieces of lumber at first, but her sales have steadily increased over the year.  She says that she is pleased with her progress because she is making money.  Nelly says that she and her partner struggled with money before because raising two boys is expensive.  She started the business because she wanted to pay some of the family's expenses, but also because she wanted something that would keep her busy.  Her success has encouraged her to consider other businesses and she wants to add rooms to her house that she can rent to boarders.

Nelly says that this is her 5th MFP loan.  She has used past loans to grow her business.  She likes her community bank and says its members are very supportive.  She will use this 4000 new soles loan to buy wholesale supplies of lumber--strips, sheets, etc.--that she will resell.

loans.use: Compra de madera aserrada para incrementar su stock

loans.name: Rogelio

texts.en:
Rogelio has been a hog raiser for six years. He is 39 years of age, married, and has three children. All of his children go to school.

Rogelio's wife is the owner of a retail store. The couple’s main priority is to let their children finish their degree courses so that they can find better opportunities someday. 

Rogelio would like to ask for financial assistance in the amount of PHP 20,000, which will be invested in the purchase of livestock feed and vitamins to ensure proper growth of his raised hogs. 

He knows that through this amount of loan, he could provide his family a better way of living and will enable him to educate all his children.

loans.use: to buy livestock feed and vitamins to ensure proper growth of his raised hogs.

loans.name: Kossi

texts.fr: Kossi  43 ans est un homme marié et père de 3 enfants tous scolarisés, âgés respectivement de 12, 15, et 17 ans. Il exerce le métier de peintre bâtiment et travaille pour le compte de personnes morales et physiques. Sa conjointe quant à elle est revendeuse au port autonome de Lomé. Kossi ne rencontre pas assez de  difficulté particulière dans l’exercice de son métier et emploi 2 employés. Il a décidé d’effectuer ses opérations financières avec WAGES et Il sollicite un crédit remboursable en 12 mensualités en vue d’acheter des matériels de travail. Il espère devenir un grand établissement et avoir une bonne famille. Il exerce l'activité il y a 17ans.
texts.en: Kossi, who is 43 years old, is a married man and father to three children. They are 12, 15 and 17 years old respectively and are all at school; Kossi is a painter of buildings by profession and works for private individuals and companies. His wife is a retailer at Lomé's autonomous port. He does not have any particular difficulties carrying out his work and employs two employees. He has decided to carry out his financial transactions with WAGES and is requesting a loan repayable over twelve months, with a view to buy work equipment. He hopes to develop a large company and have a good family. He has been carrying out this activity for the past 17 years.

loans.use: to buy work tools

loans.name: Vivencio

texts.en:
Vivencio, who is married and blessed with three children, only attained an elementary school education due to family privations. Those early experiences are why he has been striving hard to earn a living raising hogs for the past four years, an enterprise that is enabling him to educate his children.

Currently raising two sows, Vivencio is requesting a loan of PHP 20,000 to buy hog feed, vaccines and vitamins for them. These purchases will enable the pigs to achieve their optimum growth which will result in better prices when he sells them.

loans.use: to buy hog feed, vaccines and vitamins for pigs.

loans.name: Fatima

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 1 filha de 6 anos de idade e frequenta a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta sua sobrinha que vive com ela. 	
Tem um negócio próprio de venda de produtos alimentares, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (ferro, cimento, chapas de zinco, barrotes e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa.
No futuro deseja concluir a sua casa e construir casa de aluguer para aumentar a sua renda, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a saturação do mercado e o alto preço dos produtos.
texts.en:
The borrower is a married mother of one, whose 6 year old daughter attends school. She lives in her own home with her family and supports her niece, who also lives with her. The borrower runs a business selling food products, and with this loan she intends to buy building materials (iron, cement, corrugated metal sheeting, joists and other items) in order to continue the building work on her family home.
In the future she hopes to complete her home and build a house to rent out so that she can increase her income; consequently, she promises to adhere to her loan's repayment schedule so that she can apply again to Hluvuku.
The biggest challenges that she has to face in her business are the saturation of the market and products' high prices.

loans.use: with her desire to buy building materials (iron, cement, corrugated metal sheeting, joists and other items).

loans.name: Mirian Mireya

texts.es: Mirian tiene 42 años nació en Jipijapa recinto de Manabí pero hace mas de 20 años se radico en Guayaquil, actualmente vive en Paraíso de la Flor donde tiene una vivienda propia de cemento contando con los servicios de agua y luz. El negocio que tiene Mirian es la venta de mariscos en especial de pescado, empezó el negocio hace 5 años cuando su esposo la abandono junto a sus hijos. No se queja ya que le ha ido muy bien en el negocio permitiéndole brindarle seguridad económica a su familia. El negocio lo maneja ella sin ayuda, inicia sus labores en la madrugada ya que se dirige al mercado mayorista para la compra del producto, esto lo hace 2 veces por semana, luego procede a su venta en la parte frontal de su domicilio. El producto lo mantiene en refrigeración para que aguante los cambios de temperatura. Con el crédito va a comprar mariscos para su venta, espera mejorar sus ventas ya que le gustaría realizar hacer adecuaciones en su vivienda y mejorar su estilo de vida.
texts.en:
Mirian, 42, was born in Jipijapa district in Manabí but moved to Guayaquil over 20 years ago.  She currently lives in Paraíso de la Flor where she owns her cement house; it has electricity and water.

Mirian’s business is selling seafood, especially fish.  She started the business five years ago when her husband abandoned her and their children.  She does not complain since she’s done very well in the business and has been able to provide her family with economic security.

She runs the business with no help from anyone.  She starts her chores at dawn because she heads out to the wholesale market to buy the product.  She does this twice a week and then proceeds to sell it in front of her house.  She keeps the product refrigerated so that it will withstand the temperature changes.

She will use the loan to buy seafood to sell.  She hopes to improve sales because she’d like to do some home improvements and to improve her lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy fish.

loans.name: Marta

texts.pt:
Viúva e mãe de 6 filhos já maiores de idade, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta alguns netos que vivem com ela. 	
Tem uma área onde pratica actividade agrícola no regadio de Mafuiane, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar insumos agrícolas (sementes, adubos, fertilizantes, pesticidas e outros) para retomar a actividade que havia parado por falta de água no regadio.
No futuro deseja aumentar a sua área de produção e tornar-se um agricultor de renome, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é melhorar as condições de vida da sua família através da sua actividade.
texts.en:
The borrower is a widowed mother of 6 children, all of whom are now grown up. She lives with her family in her own home and she supports some of her grandchildren who live with her.
She farms an area of land within the Mafuiane irrigated region, and with this current loan she intends to buy farming supplies (seeds, manure, fertilizers, pesticides and other items) in order to revive her farming activities which had stopped due to lack of water in the irrigation system.
In the future she wishes to increase the size of her farming area and become a well-known farmer, as such she promises to adhere to her loan's repayment schedule so that she can apply again to Hluvuku.
The biggest challenge that she faces is to use her farming activities to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: with her desire to buy farming supplies (seeds, manure, fertilizers, pesticides and other items).

loans.name: Blanca Olivia

texts.es: Blanca de 36 años está casada con Oscar quien es maestro albañil, juntos tienen 3 hijos quienes estudian en el colegio. Blanca se dedica desde hace 3 años a la crianza y venta de pollos trabajo que realiza junto a su esposo. El trabajo que realiza es un poco agotador ya que hay que cuidar de los animales dándoles la comida y la limpieza del mismo en esta tarea les resulta provechosa la ayuda de sus hijos. Luego está la venta del animal que la realiza en una tienda ubicada en el parque de las Orquídeas, lugar donde vive. Atiende de lunes a domingos desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 5 de la tarde. Con el préstamo que está solicitando va a comprar pollos, vitaminas de engorde y balanceado para la crianza, espera mejorar sus ventas ya que su sueño inmediato es poder arreglar su casa.
texts.en:
Blanca, 36, is married to Oscar who is a master builder.  They have three children who attend school.  Blanca has been raising chickens to sell for three years, work she does alongside her husband.  

The work she does is a bit tiring because the animals must be cared for.  They have to be fed and kept clean.  Her children help her with these tasks.  

The animals are then sold in a store she has in Parque de las Orquídeas which is where she lives.  She’s open Monday through Sunday from 7am until 5pm. 

She will use the loan she’s asking for to buy chicks, vitamins and feed.  She hopes to improve sales since her short-term goal is to be able to make some home improvements.

loans.use: to buy chicks, vitamins and feed.

loans.name: Razafimbelo Rita's Group

texts.fr: Il s'agit d'un groupe de deux personnes en caution solidaire. Razafimbelo Rita, la responsable,est mariée et âgée de 47 ans. Elle à 05 enfants scolarisés. Razafimbelo Rita vend de la nourriture depuis 01an. Elle s'approvisionne dans l'un des marchés du Bénin. En vue de répondre à la demande de sa clientèle et de satisfaire les besoins de ses enfants, elle a sollicité et obtenu un micro crédit à Finadev. Razafimbelo Rita se retrouve à gauche de la photo.
texts.en: This is a group of two people who have joint liability. Razafimbelo Rita, who is in charge of the group, is married and 47 years old. She has five children who are at school. She has been selling food for a year and gets her supplies in one of Benin's markets. With a view to responding to customer demand and satisfying her children's needs, she has requested and been granted a micro-loan from Finadev. Rasafimbelo Rita is on the left of the photo.

loans.use: to buy condiments

loans.name: Faysal

texts.en:
Faysal is a 30-year-old young man. He is married and a father to daughters. He is a construction worker who gets a low salary, which is not enough to cover the family's needs and complete the price of the vehicle.

Faysal is requesting a USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing a new vehicle. This will help him to carry his construction kit and tools from one work place to another, which will facilitate his transportation and improve the family's income.

Faysal is photographed next to his vehicle.

loans.use: to complete the price of purchasing the vehicle.

loans.name: Andjelika

texts.ru: Анжелика жительница города Худжанд. Ей 40 лет. Она замужем. У нее один ребенок. Ее муж работает сантехником. Сама Анжелика у себя дома занимается шитьем скатертей, наволочек, простыней и пододеяльников. Этим видом деятельности она занимается 20 лет. Кредит берет для приобретения ниток, иголок и однотонных материалов.
texts.en: Andjelika lives in Khujand. She is 40 years old and married with one child. Her husband is a plumber. Andjelika has a small business out of her home sewing and embroidering tablecloths, pillowcases, sheets, and duvet covers. She has been doing this for 20 years. Andjelika is taking out a loan to purchase thread, needles and plain cloth.

loans.use: to buy thread, needles, and plain cloth

loans.name: Karina

texts.es:
Karina tiene 35 años, es una mujer trabajadora y con muchas ganas de salir adelante. Está casada con Abel, quien se profesor, fruto de esta unión tienen dos hijos; Karibel de 10 años y Abel de 7 años, a quienes quiere mucho.

Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa. Todas sus prendas las trae desde la capital y las vende entre sus amistades, vecinos y compañeros de trabajo, pues cuenta con un empleo como docente en un colegio de su localidad. Su negocio lo inició hace 8 años y hasta el momento cuenta con la ayuda de su prima, quien vive en la capital y le envía la mercadería, la venta la realiza ella sola, pero para  la cobranza le apoya su pareja con su movilidad para ahorrar en gastos de transporte. Le gusta su negocio porque le permite tener un ingreso económico adicional para apoyar a su pareja a solventar los gastos de su hogar y las necesidades de sus pequeños hijos, quienes son la motivación para seguir progresando. 

Este es su segundo préstamo con la institución MFP y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero para seguir con su negocio. Por otro lado, comenta sentirse a gusto con su banco comunal, pues es un grupo de buenas personas y cumplidas en sus pagos.
Con el monto solicitado, de 2000 nuevos soles, invertirá en la compra de ropa de variados diseños y modelos, según el pedido de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Karina, 35, is a hardworking woman who very much wants to get ahead.  She’s married to Abel who is a teacher.  They have two children: Karibel, 10, and Abel, 7, who she loves very much.

She sells clothes.  She brings all her articles of clothing from the capital and sells them among her friends, neighbors and coworkers because she has a job as a teacher in a local school.  She started the business 8 years ago and to date gets help from her cousin who lives in the capital and sends her the merchandise.  She does the sales by herself but when it comes to collecting payment her spouse helps her with his car in order to save transportation costs.  She likes her business because it allows her to earn additional income to help her spouse cover household expenses and meet her small children’s needs who are the motivating force to continue making progress.

This is her second MFP loan and she feels grateful for the financial support to stay in business.  She also feels very comfortable with her communal bank because it’s a group of good people who make their payments.

She will use the requested 2000 new soles to buy clothes in varied designs and styles according to her customers’ orders.

loans.use: to stock up on clothes.

loans.name: Ana

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 4 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Tem um negócio próprio de criação e venda de frangos, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar pintos, ração, vitaminas e medicamentos para aumentar a quantidade dos frangos e responder a demanda da sua clientela.
No futuro deseja aumentar a quantidade de seus frangos e construir novas capoeiras em outras zonas, para tal compromete-se a pagar o empréstimo segundo o calendário para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a falta de fundos para poder expandir seu negócio para outros Distritos.
texts.en:
The borrower is a married mother of 4 children who all attend school. She lives in her own home with her family and she does not financially support anyone else.
She runs a business raising and selling chickens, and with this current loan she intends to buy chicks, feed rations, vitamins and medications in order to increase the size of her brood and to respond to her clients' requirements.
In the future she wishes to increase the size of her brood and build new hen-houses in other areas; as such, she promises to punctually repay her loan according to the stated schedule so that she can apply again to Hluvuku.
The biggest challenge that she faces is a lack of funds which prevents her from being able to expand her business into other districts.

loans.use: with her desire to buy chicks, feed rations, vitamins and medications to increase the size of her chicken brood and to respond to her clients' demands.

loans.name: Irene Christie

texts.fr: Irene est une jeune femme de 33 ans et celibataire. Elle est mere de trois enfants dont l'age varie entre 6 mois et 11 ans. Deux de ses enfants vont deja a l'ecole. Elle a ouvert et gere une petite parfumerie depuis 2 ans deja. Grace a sa bonne experience elle a acquise une clientele loyale, mais la petitesse de son capital lui cause souvent des soucis de rupture permanent de stock de ses produits fars. D'ou son envie de renforcer son stock des laits et savons en achetant plusieurs cartons pour satisfaire sa clientele, augmenter ses ventes, ainsi que ses benefices. Irene reinvestira une partie de son benefice pour encore agrandir sa parfumerie et le reste pour subvenir au besoin de sa famille.
texts.en: Irene is a young woman who is 33 years old and single. She has three children aged between six months and 11 years old. Two of these children already go to school. She has opened and been managing a small perfume shop for the past two years. Thanks to her good experience she has build up a loyal customer base, but her small capital means she has regular concerns about her stock of leading products running out permanently. This is why she wants to boost her stock of body lotions and soaps by buying several cartons so she can satisfy customer demand, as well as increase her sales and her profits. Irene will reinvest part of of her profit to expand her perfume shop further and the rest will be used to provide for her family's needs.

loans.use: to increase her stock (soaps and body lotions)

loans.name: Maher

texts.en:
Maher, who appears in the picture, is a 30-year-old young man. He is a worker in an aluminum workshop and gets a low salary, which is not enough to cover the family's needs and medical expenses.

Maher is requesting a 2,000 USD loan from FATEN to help him pay his daughter's medical expenses. She is suffering from a disease in her ear. This will improve Maher's daughter's health so she gets better and will enable her to live in normal conditions with the family.

loans.use: to pay the medical expenses to cure his daughter.

loans.name: Isidro Ayora  (Jaramijo) Group

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Isidro Ayora se reúne cada 15 días en el cantón Jaramijo, este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas que bañan las costas de este hermoso lugar, aquí la mayoría de los habitantes son muy trabajadores y dedicados a las faenas del mar.

Este es un grupo de personas que decidieron unirse hace 4 meses  atrás y formar este Grupo De Crédito que les ha servido de mucho para aumentar sus negocios. Ellos se dedican a diversas actividades tales como, comercio en general, venta de comida, servicios entre otras actividades.

En este lugar vive Don Francisco, tiene 51 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo de 4 meses de nacido. Su mujer se dedica a las labores de la casa.

Nuestro amigo para ganarse la vida y tener como llevar el pan diario al hogar, se dedica hacer fletes en moto taxi, nos cuenta que en este lugar ese es el medio de transporte muy utilizado por las personas del lugar y turistas, los lugareños se transportarse a diario a diferentes lugares y a los turistas él les ofrece el servicio para llevarlos a visitar las bellezas del lugar, nos cuenta que es en estos fletes cuando mas gana ya que además de pagar por sus servicio les dejan buenas propinas, lleva más de 15 años ofreciendo este servicio lo cual le ha permitido salir adelante honestamente.

Este crédito lo espera utilizar para comprar un motor nuevo ya que el que tiene su moto ya esta deteriorado, este  es su primer ciclo en el Banco Comunal y espera seguir por mucho tiempo recibiendo la ayuda del banco. 

Sus sueños son seguir adelante y darle lo mejor a su familia.

En la foto salen dos personas que no pertenecen al grupo, el señor de camiseta blanca y la señora con el bebe, el señor es esposo de una socia y la señora fue a la reunión por que espera entrar en el próximo ciclo.
texts.en:
The Isidro Ayora community bank meets every 15 days in Jaramijo, a place known for its beautiful beaches and spectacular coastline.  Local people--many of whom make their living from the sea--work hard.  

The members of the group formed the community bank some 4 months ago and they tell us that it has been a great help to their businesses.  The members operate a variety of businesses: general retail; food sales; and service businesses, for example. 

Our member, Don Francisco, 51, is partnered and has a 4-month old son.  His wife is a homemaker.  

Don Francisco operates a mototaxi business.  He tells us that mototaxis are an important means of transportation here and widely used by both local people and tourists.  Local people use mototaxis because they're the most common way to get around and tourists use them to see local sights.  Don Francisco says that he especially likes showing tourists around, not only for the fares but also because they're generous tippers.  He has operated the business for 15 years and says that it is an honest living.    

Don Francisco will use this loan to replace his mototaxi's worn-out engine .  This will be the first loan that he's received from the community bank and he tells us that he hopes to borrow through the bank in the future, as well.

For the future, he hopes to provide for his family in the best way that he can.

There are two people in the photo that do not belong to the gruop: The man in the white shirt and the woman with the baby.  The man is the husband of one of the members and the woman hopes to join the bank's next round of borrowing.

loans.use: Comprar un motor para moto.

loans.name: Maritza

texts.es:
Maritza tiene 41 años, es una mujer muy trabajadora y dinámica, además de alegre y amable. Es madre de tres hijos; Jim, Larry y Jhack de 23 y 19 años (mellizos) respectivamente. Vive con ellos en la casa de los padres de su ex pareja, o sea lo abuelos de sus hijos.

Su actividad es la venta de desayunos (jugos de frutas y sándwiches), de lunes a viernes, para lo que se instala en el frontis de su vivienda. Lleva dedicándose a esta actividad hace más de un año y hasta el momento cuenta con la ayuda de sus hijos en la atención de los clientes. Lo que le gusta es el ingreso económico que le genera, poder apoyar a su familia con algunos gastos y el tiempo libre que tiene que lo puede usar en otras actividades. Antes de iniciar con esta actividad no tenía una buena economía para solventar los gastos de sus hijos. Por otro lado, comenta que en este negocio no se pierde, siempre hay demanda, por lo que tiene planes de mejorar el ambiente de su puesto para la comodidad de sus clientes. 

Este es su primer préstamo con la institución MFP y se siente contenta de poder contar con un capital de trabajo para su progreso. Además de estar a gusto con su banco comunal, pues en su grupo todas son personas responsables.
Con el préstamo solicitado, de 1000 nuevos soles, invertirá en la compra de mesas, sillas y utensilios. También una licuadora y una extractora, cada una valorizada en 100 nuevos soles aproximadamente.
texts.en:
Maritza, age 41, is a very hard-working and dynamic woman.  She is also cheerful and kind.  She has three children.  Jim is 23, and Larry and Jhack are 19 year old twins.  She lives with them in her ex-life partner’s parents’ house; they are her children’s grandparents.

She sells breakfast (fruit juices and sandwiches) from Monday through Fridays.  She has set up her business at the front of her house.  She has been doing this business activity for over a year.  So far her children help her take care of the customers.  What she likes is the financial income it generates, which she uses to be able to pay some expenses.

She is able to use the free time that she has in other activities.  Before starting this business activity she did not have good finances to pay for her children’s expenses.  She says that you don’t lose in this business; there is always a demand.  Therefore, she has plans to improve the environment of her stand to make her customers comfortable.

This is her first loan with MFP.  She is happy to be able to count on some work capital for her progress.  Also, she is pleased with her communal bank because all of the members of her group are responsible people.

She will use the requested 1,000 soles to buy tables, chairs, and utensils.  She will also buy a blender and an extractor.  Each one costs approximately 100 soles.

loans.use: to buy furniture, cooking utensils, and two appliances in order to prepare the juices.

loans.name: Abdullah

texts.en: Abdullah is 35 years old, married, and has six children. He lives in Taiz, Yemen. He has been raising livestock for 16 years. With the goal of further developing his business, Abdullah asked for a loan of 100,000 YER to buy additional sheep. He plans to invest the profit into further expanding his business.

loans.use: to buy additional sheep for his business

loans.name: Srey

texts.en: Srey is 51 years old. She is widowed and resides with six children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in cultivating agricultural crops for more than twenty years, earning approximately $4 per day. Two of her children are employed in a hotel. They earn about $8 per day. In order to improve her family’s finances, Srey is requesting a loan of $800 to purchase cattle to raise in order to resell when they gain weight. In addition, this money will be used for purchasing timber to rebuild her house as well. By doing so, she would earn more income to support her family and provide better living conditions for her family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase cattle to raise in order to resell when they gain weight

loans.name: Alegría

texts.es:
Alegría tiene 57 años, está casada con Teodoro, el padre de sus cinco hijos. Actualmente vive con su esposo, uno de sus hijos y dos nietos.
Su negocio es la venta de abarrotes y comestibles en general. Tiene una bodega que instaló en su vivienda. Empezó hace 6 años, debido a que uno de sus hijos estuvo muy enfermo y necesitaban pagar los gastos de su cuidado. Al comienzo compraba pequeñas cantidades de comestibles, logrando crecer poco a poco, a base de esfuerzo y contando con el apoyo de su esposo en la atención de los clientes. Tiene muchos deseos de continuar y aumentar el stock de su mercadería.

Este es su préstamo número 12 con la institución MFP, desde un inicio (cerca de 6 años) cuando conoció de los créditos de esta microfinanciera se ha sentido con un respaldo para continuar con su negocio. Además de sentirse bien con su banco comunal, pues conoce a la mayoría y ahora han ingresado personas nuevas, que espera sean responsables como el resto del grupo.
Con el monto solicitado, de 2500 nuevos soles, invertirá en la compra de abarrotes y comestibles, al por mayor, para su bodega. También golosinas, ya que estos productos tienen gran demanda.
texts.en:
Alegría, age 57, is married to Teodoro, the father of her five children.  She currently lives with her husband, one of her children, and two grandchildren.

Her business is selling groceries and food in general.  She has a grocery store that she set up in her house.  She started six years ago because one of her children was very sick, and she needed to pay the expenses for his care.

At the beginning she bought small quantities of food, and she managed to grow little by little.  She did this through effort and her husband’s help with taking care of the customers.  She has a great desire to continue and to increase the stock of her merchandise.

This is her 12th loan with MFP since the start (close to six years) when she learned about the loans from this microfinance institution.  She has felt that she has a support in order to continue with her business.  She also feels good in her communal bank.  She knows most everyone, and now new people are joining.  She hopes they will be responsible like the rest of the group.

She will use the requested 2,500 soles to buy groceries and foods wholesale for her grocery store.  She will also buy sweets because these products are in great demand.

loans.use: to buy food in order to increase the stock in her grocery store.

loans.name: Amistad Y Paz Group

texts.es:
“AMISTAD Y PAZ” es la alcancía que conforma la  Sra. Zelma. Ella tiene 33 años es casada con 02 hijos su esposo trabaja manejando un moto taxi, brindando servicio de transporte público y ella tiene su negocio de venta de salchipapas y hamburguesas, ya son 07 años que tiene el negocio y fue gracias a su primer préstamo que pudo comprar su carrito sanguchero una cocina que le sirve para preparar esos alimentos. Poco a poco su negocio fue creciendo hasta convertirse en uno de los favoritos de la zona, gracias a su trabajo ayuda a su esposo en los gastos de la casa y le da educación a sus hijos. Más adelante le gustaría poner un restaurante en su casa, para eso quiere acondicionar el lugar y su  préstamo lo usará comprar sillas, mesas e ir acondicionando dicho ambiente. En la actualidad la Sra. Zelma es la secretaria del grupo y esta agradecida a EDAPROSPO porque gracias a sus préstamos ha logrado tener su propio negocio.
*Zelma es la cuarta de la derecha, viste polo marrón.
texts.en:
“Amistad y Paz” (Friendship and Peace) is the communal bank Zelma’s part of.  She’s 33-years-old, married and has two children.  Her husband works driving a mototaxi providing public transportation services and she has a ‘salchipapas’ [fried sausages with fried potatoes] and hamburger stand that she’s had for seven years already.  

It was thanks to her first loan that she was able to buy her food cart and a stove she uses to prepare this food.  Gradually her business grew until it became one of the favorites in the zone.  Thanks to her work she helps her husband with household expenses and can give her children an education in a good school.  

For later on she’d like to open a restaurant at home and to do so needs to equip space which is what she will use the loan for to start this project fixing up said space.  Currently, Zelma’s group secretary and she’s grateful to EDAPROSPO because thanks to its loans she’s been able to have her own business.

*Zelma is wearing a brown shirt.

loans.use: buy chairs and tables for her restaurant

loans.name: Sabohon

texts.ru: Сабохон, женщина в возрсте 47 лет, разведена  и имеет одного сына. Проживает она в сельской местности. Она не имеет образования и после развода с мужем она стала заниматься торговлей.У нее мелкий бизнес(разные сладости,жвачки,семечки)  Торговля- это ее основной доход. Сабохон является пенсионеркой и получает пенсию по инвалидности. Не смотря на свое не легкое положение она из-за всех сил старается дать своему сыну всё необходимое, чтобы он не в чем не нуждался. Сабохон берет кредит, чтобы расширить свою торговлю. Она благодарна таким организациям, так как наша поддержка- ее успех!
texts.en: Sabohon is 47 year-old woman, who is divorced and has one son.  She lives in a rural area.  She does not have an education and became involved in sales after her divorce.  She has a small business (various sweets, chewing gum, seeds).  Sales is the primary source of her income.  Sabohon is a retiree and receives a disability pension.  Despite her difficult situation, she tries with all her powers to provide her son with all of the essentials, so that he would not have any needs.  Sabohon is requesting this loan to expand her sales.  She is grateful to such organizations because our support is her success!

loans.use: to expand her business

loans.name: Gulbakhor

texts.ru:
Гульбахор 47 лет, замужем, имеет 2 детей. Гульбахор арендует  в столовую, где работает в качестве повара и в качестве дополнительного дохода   с 1995 года занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес со стартовой суммы в 10,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Гульбахор,  в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется  1 дойная корова, 4 овцы,  которые в целях экономии средств на корм отогнаны на горное пастбище, прибыль от продажи молока и доходы от столовой составляют 10,000 сом. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Гульбахор обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 120,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку дойной коровы и мелкого скота на откорм.  Доходы от кредита Гульбахор планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en: Gulbakhor is 47 years old, married and has two children.  She leases a cafe, where she works as a cook and, to provide an additional source of income for her family, has been involved in animal husbandry since 1995, having started this business with an initial sum of 10,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to her hard work, today Gulbakhor's business contains one dairy cow and four sheep, which have been moved to a mountain pasture to save money on livestock feed.  The profit from the sales of milk and earnings from the cafe yield 10,000 som.  In order to further develop her business, Gulbakhor requested a loan in the amount of 120,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to purchase a dairy cow and small livestock for fattening up.  She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into a continued increase of livestock quantities.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Kulsumkhan

texts.ru:
Кулсумхан 50 лет, замужем, имеет 4 детей. В качестве основного дохода  с 1997 года Кулсумхан занимается животноводством и полеводством, начав этот бизнес со стартовой суммы в 50,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Кулсумхан,  в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется  2 дойные коровы с приплодом, 1 лошадь, 1,20 га земли с фасолью и картофелем,  прибыль от продажи молока составляет 5,000 сом. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Кулсумхан обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку 2 нетелей.  Доходы от кредита Кулсумхан планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en: Kulsumkhan is 50 years old, married and has four children.  As a source of her primary income, she has been involved in animal husbandry and farming since 1997, having started this business with an initial sum of 50,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to her hard work, today Kulsumkhan's business contains two dairy cows with offspring, one horse, and 1.20 hectares of land with beans and potatoes.  The profit from the sales of milk amounts to 5,000 som.  In order to further develop her business, Kulsumkhan requested a loan in the amount of 60,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to purchase two heifers.  She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into a continued increase of domestic livestock quantities.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Sarah Group

texts.en:
This group is called Sarah and it consists of five members: Walia, Fenon, Amriah, Fuadh, and Amirh. They live in Taiz, Yemen. They took a loan of 240,000 YER from AMB.

Walia is a hardworking 31-year-old mother directorate. She has three children. She lives in Taiz, Yemen. She is the woman standing in the middle in the photo. She has been selling clothing. She has applied for this loan of 40,000 YER in order to buy more of fabric and baby clothes so she can start doing advanced work. She hopes to open her own clothing store to increase her capital.

loans.use: to buy more of fabric and baby clothes for her business.

loans.name: Esam

texts.en:
Esam is 28 years old and a single man. He works very hard to provide for the family.
He runs a pharmacy in Sana`a, Yemen and requested a loan of 80,000 YER to purchase additional medicines to sell. He lives in Sana`a, Yemen.
He has been in this business for six months and sells a variety of items such as injections, medicines, and baby diapers.
In the future, he would like to save money to expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase additional medicines for resale

loans.name: Tania Fernanda

texts.es:
La Señorita Tania es socia del banco comunal Sector 3 María, vive por el sector Medio Ejido en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es de clima frió, es la tercera de ciudad de mayor importancia económica del país, es desde Diciembre de 1999 Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, su gente es amable, gentil y aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

La Señorita. Tania tiene 19 años de edad, es soltera y vive con sus padres quienes se dedican a la cría de gallos, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando. 

Nuestra socia estudia en la Universidad la carrera de Periodismo, se encuentra en el primer año y está ejerciendo su profesión ya que labora como reportera y presentadora de noticias en una conocida radio de la ciudad.

Este es el primer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal al cual fue invitada por su mamá, el dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir  en el pago de un curso de fotografía y radio.
 
Su meta es viajar a Chile para profesionalizarse en el área de la fotografía.
texts.en:
Tania is a member of the communal bank 'Sector 3'. She lives in the 'Medio Ejido' sector in the city of Cuenca. This city has a cold climate and is the third most important city economically in the country. Since 1999 it has been recognized as an UNESCO World Heritage Site. The people from this area are friendly, gentle, and continue to practice the traditions of their culture.    

Tania is 19 years old, single and lives with her parents who make a living raising chickens. They do not own their own home, which is why they rent the home they live in. 

This community bank member is studying in the university, majoring in journalism. She is currently in her first year and is already practicing her profession, working as a news reporter for a well known radio station in the city. 

This is the first loan she has taken out in the communal bank, to which she was invited to join by her mother. She will use the money from the loan to pay for her photography and radio classes. 

Her goal is to travel to Chile to become a professional photographer.

loans.use: to pay for a radio and photography class.

loans.name: Tuwuliriza Women Association Group

texts.en:
Eva, a member of the group, is a 22-year-old single mother of 2 children aged 2 and 6 years, both of whom go to school. She sells small fish known as silver fish in the city outskirts. She began the business in 2009 so that she could raise money to take care of her young children being a single mother. Her main clients are mainly neighbours and buyers with in the market.

Her main challenge is the rainy season which affects the quantity of the fish on the market raising the costs. Her dream is to go back to school since she dropped out at senior six as a result of lack of school fees. Eva is  very hard working and clever.

The group is committed to seeing that the loans move them to another level.

loans.use: To buy silver fish for sale.

loans.name: Abdulkaream

texts.en:
Abdulkaream is 48 years old, is married and has four daughters. He lives in Sana`a, Yemen. He is a doctor in a hospital. He has a house that he wants to buy housewares for. So, he requested a loan of 100,000 YER from AMB to buy housewares for his house.
He hopes to open a clinic.

loans.use: to buy housewares for his house

loans.name: Munir

texts.en: Munir is a 24-year-old single man. He lives in Taiz. He has built a small house and wants to complete it. Firstly, he inherited the land from his dad. He is requesting a loan of 100,000 YER from AMB to help him cover the costs of purchasing cement and iron. This will ensure him better living conditions.

loans.use: to help him cover the costs of purchasing cement and iron

loans.name: Phorn

texts.en:
Phorn, a 33-year-old married mother of five, resides in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia where she has been employed as a cleaner in a local organization for more than a year, earning approximately $2 per day. Her husband is a construction foreman who earns about $6 per day.

Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Phorn is requesting a loan of $500 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would enable her to use the money saved from her transportation expenses to support the family.

In the future, she would like to run a grocery store at home and send her children to a good school. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting.

loans.name: Chenda

texts.en:
Chenda, a 48-year-old married mother of two, resides in Prey Veng Province, Cambodia where she has been involved in growing rice and fattening up animals for more than 10 years, earning approximately $5 per day. Her husband helps her run the business, while her children are employed in a garment factory earning about $6 per day.

Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Chenda is requesting a loan of $500 to buy a motorbike for commuting. This purchase will help her children get to work on time and reduce transportation expenses.

In the future, she would like to expand her business and rebuild her house to make it bigger and more comfortable for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting.

loans.name: Lidia Maribel

texts.es:
La Señora. Lidia es socia del banco comunal Sector 3 María, vive por una comunidad que pertenece a la parroquia de Turi en Cuenca, parroquia que es reconocida por la belleza de su iglesia, también es admirada ya que desde allí se puede admirar gran parte de la ciudad de Cuenca, su gente es amable, gentil luchadora y trabajadora, se dedican a laborar en el comercio, cría de animales y agricultura.

La Señora. Lidia tiene 35 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido un hijo  de 10 años de edad  que está estudiando en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo labora en el área de la construcción como albañil, la casa en la que vive es de su propiedad.
 
Doña Lidia se dedica a la venta de cosméticos de varias marcas, actividad que la desempeña hace 5 años, también labora en la preparación y venta de comida, negocio que es propiedad de su madre y trabaja allí de lunes a sábados medio día.
 
Este es el primer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir para la compra de pollos para iniciar con la cría y venta de estos animales y así empezar con un nuevo negocio.
 
Su meta es crecer en el negocio de los pollos.
texts.en:
Lidia is a member of the “Sector 3 María” communal bank.  She lives in a community belonging to Turi Parish in Cuenca.  This parish is known for the beauty of its church and is also admired because one can view a large part of the city of Cuenca from there.  Its people are very nice, kind, tenacious and hardworking.  They work in commerce, animal husbandry and in agriculture.
